Package game

Class Main

java.lang.Object
javafx.application.Application
game.Main
public class Main extends javafx.application.Application
This is the Main class for the game. It calls and prints all objects required for the game. Sets current status of the game and renders the right stage accordingly.

  • Nested Class Summary
